elements.title: Flashcardz
elements.description: Flash card web app that I created out of boredom to help with studying for the AWS Cloud Practitioner Certification Exam.

elements.title: A Weather Dashboard
elements.description: This is a weather dashboard that displays both the current weather and the 5 day forecast for a selected city. For each city search, a search history is generated as new buttons below the input field.
